DOC.brief_summary: Postprandial glycaemic control important risk factor development type 2 diabetes , cardiovascular disease all-cause mortality . Previous research demonstrate exercise perform postprandial state paradoxically result deterioration glucose tolerance immediate post-exercise period ( Gonzalez et . 2013 ; Gonzalez Stevenson 2013 ) . DOC.brief_title: Effect Timing Post-exercise Oral Glucose Tolerance Test Glycaemic Control .
DOC.criteria: Normal weight ( 1825 kg/m2 ) Physically active ( > or= 3 time per week ) Male Contraindications exercise Food intolerance Food allergy
